## Our research

The Chen Lab studies how disruptions in RNA regulation drive childhood cancer.
Our work focuses on understanding how defects in RNA synthesis, processing, and
degradation reshape gene expression programs in pediatric tumors.

---

## Research areas


![](/images/kidney-tumor-rna.png){.bio-photo}

### [*DICER1*-related cancers](/research/dicer1.qmd)
Understanding how alterations in the microRNA-processing gene *DICER1* drive pleuropulmonary blastoma and other pediatric tumors.

### [Wilms tumor](/research/wilms.qmd)
Defining how transcriptional and chromatin dysregulation contribute to pediatric kidney cancer.

### [Pineoblastoma](/research/pineo.qmd)
Investigating how tumors evade transcriptional inhibition and develop resistance to therapy.
